sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import './LoginSignup.css' import user_icon from '../Assets/person.png' import email_icon from '../Assets/email.png' import password_icon from '../Assets/password.png' const LoginSignup = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', password: '' }) // Load data from localStorage when component mounts useEffect(() => { const savedData = localStorage.getItem('userData') if (savedData) { setFormData(JSON.parse(savedData)) console.log('Data loaded from localStorage:', JSON.parse(savedData)) } }, []) const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log('Login Data:', formData) // Store in localStorage (persistent storage) localStorage.setItem('userData', JSON.stringify(formData)) console.log('Data saved to localStorage') // Here you can add your login logic alert('Login data saved! Check localStorage in browser dev tools.') } return (
Login
Lost password? Click Here!
) } export default LoginSignup
